p: The efficacy of this allylbenzene in arthritic rats was verified by Grespan and colleagues [ 60]. Arthritis was induced in mice through the injection of an emulsion of bovin collagen type II and complete Freund’s adjuvant. Here, 100 µg of eugenol/day were administered orally. This compound was demonstrated to inhibit mononuclear cell infiltration and to decrease the cytokine (TNF-α, IFN-γ, and TGF-β) levels within the ankle joints.
